00022 #include "Common/Compat.h"
00023 #include "ScannerMap.h"

00025 using namespace Hypertable;
00026 
00027 atomic_t ScannerMap::ms_next_id = ATOMIC_INIT(0);
00028 
00031 uint32_t ScannerMap::put(CellListScannerPtr &scanner_ptr, RangePtr &range_ptr) {
00032   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00033   ScanInfo scaninfo;
00034   scaninfo.scanner_ptr = scanner_ptr;
00035   scaninfo.range_ptr = range_ptr;
00036   scaninfo.last_access_millis = get_timestamp_millis();
00037   uint32_t id = atomic_inc_return(&ms_next_id);
00038   m_scanner_map[id] = scaninfo;
00039   return id;
00040 }
00041 
00042 
00043 
00046 bool
00047 ScannerMap::get(uint32_t id, CellListScannerPtr &scanner_ptr,
00048                 RangePtr &range_ptr) {
00049   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00050   CellListScannerMap::iterator iter = m_scanner_map.find(id);
00051   if (iter == m_scanner_map.end())
00052     return false;
00053   (*iter).second.last_access_millis = get_timestamp_millis();
00054   scanner_ptr = (*iter).second.scanner_ptr;
00055   range_ptr = (*iter).second.range_ptr;
00056   return true;
00057 }
00058 
00059 
00060 
00063 bool ScannerMap::remove(uint32_t id) {
00064   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00065   return (m_scanner_map.erase(id) == 0) ? false : true;
00066 }
00067 
00068 
00069 void ScannerMap::purge_expired(uint32_t max_idle_millis) {
00070   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00071   uint64_t now_millis = get_timestamp_millis();
00072   CellListScannerMap::iterator iter = m_scanner_map.begin();
00073 
00074   while (iter != m_scanner_map.end()) {
00075     if ((now_millis - (*iter).second.last_access_millis) > max_idle_millis) {
00076       CellListScannerMap::iterator tmp_iter = iter;
00077       HT_WARNF("Destroying scanner %d because it has not been used in %u "
00078                "milliseconds", (*iter).first, max_idle_millis);
00079       ++iter;
00080       (*tmp_iter).second.scanner_ptr = 0;
00081       (*tmp_iter).second.range_ptr = 0;
00082       m_scanner_map.erase(tmp_iter);
00083     }
00084     else
00085       ++iter;
00086   }
00087 
00088 }
00089 
00090 
00091 uint64_t ScannerMap::get_timestamp_millis() {
00092   boost::xtime now;
00093   boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00094   return ((uint64_t)now.sec * 1000LL) + ((uint64_t)now.nsec / 1000000LL);
00095 }
